name: Escalaide
description:
"Jem & Jen are the 2 most powerfull knights on Earth. They attacked the Demon God and he launched the Apocalypse on Earth as a vengeance. They have to climb the highest mountain to escape a sea of lava, throwing their accumulated experience points to each other to be seen as a weakling by the Demon God for his arrival."

Game was made under 48 hours, we chose egality as a theme. The pedagogy here is to put one pride aside because it's not always the strongest who wins. And the game is spoken as a versus game but if you try to cooperate to climb together the story tells that both player wins by surpassing the Demon God.
